En son oyunu 15 sene önce beşinci sınıfa okula giderken bitirmiştim.Şimdi tekrar oynadığım zaman beni bayağı bir sevindirdi, eğlendirdi ve duygulandırdı.Eskiden herkes internet cafelerde multiplayer odaklı olarak oynardı.Ben ise evimde sabah akşam demeden.Oyunu bitirmek için senaryo modunda oynardım.Hikayesine merak salmıştım.Çünkü ne zaman ilerleme kat ettiysem bir şeyler oluyordu.İngilizce bilmesem de olayların gelişmesinden anlıyordum.Askerin dost olduğunu sanıp kucaklarına atlayıp öldüğümü çok iyi hatırlıyorum.Multiplayer modu efsanedir.Evet bu doğrudur.Ama şuan günümüze baktığımız zaman hikayesini merak ettiği için oynuyor.Şimdi oynadım herşeyi hatırladığım için çabucak bitirebildim.O eski günleri yaşattığı için Valve'a tekrar teşekkür ediyorum.Alın oynayın pişman olmazsınız :)

I have rewritten this review as my opinion on the game has changed.

This game is great. The only bad levels were On A Rail, and the Xen levels. The music was good, the story was good, and the gameplay was fun when you use quick switching. This game is worth the $10, and if you liked it a lot like me, get the Black Mesa remake.
永远的经典！

What can I say that hasn't already been said about Half-Life? Those that didn't get to experience this game in the 1990's but experience it today will probably think that the game has stiff animations, bad AI, clunky controls, and terrible graphics. But, in 1998, this game was groundbreaking... and all of the aforementioned were silky smooth and beautiful, back then. 

In Half-Life, you play as scientist Gordon Freeman who works at a research facility called Black Mesa. At this research facility, alien material is experimented on which ends up opening up a gateway to another dimension, allowing for an alien invasion on Earth. As Gordon Freeman, your goal is to escape the research facility, all the while, dealing with these aliens and U.S. Marines that are sent in to cover up the incident. Half-Life's story is very immersive and the gameplay very engaging. The puzzles are challenging but straightforward, dispatching enemies with your weapons is highly satisfying, and the bosses are fun to fight and require some ingenuity to defeat.  

If you haven't experienced Half-Life, and you're sifting through these reviews to make a decision on it, my advice to you is to give it a try. I highly recommend it! If you love Sci-fi and First Person Shooters, you'll love this game.

Questo gioco ha fatto la storia del gaming. Ma ormai è vecchio, al punto da non essere quasi giocabile. Fisica, grafica, interazioni... 20 anni sono troppi. Quindi, nel 2020 non posso consigliare questo gioco.
Un gran clásico que aunque con un control que flojea mucho debido a la edad, se mantiene firme en el resto de aspectos aún con  el paso de los años.

I wasn't gaming on a computer back in the late 90's when Half-Life revolutionized FPS gaming and story-telling. For me, Half-Life was just part of the package when I wanted to play Counter-Strike. I really was surprised when I decided to play it and began learning just how special this piece of gaming history was. Today, Half-Life is more than just the memes or stories you know it for. Having just finished a playthrough on hard using only auto-saves, the narrative and the games mechanics really shine in a way that I never saw before. Running through chapters and spamming your weapons at enemies while you tanked past them was no longer an option. Instead, I found myself being more immersed as I explored every inch of the environment for extra ammo, health, HEV charge units, and supply crates. Even finding a scientist hiding out who could heal me felt personal and memorable. By the time I faced the G-Man after my final battle on Xen, I reflected for a moment on the path I had taken. The weight of it all has elevated my perspective on this old story and these characters. If you are looking to play a game that serves as the beginning to a chapter that is finally being written again after all these years, that journey starts here. Or as G-Man would say, "Time to choose..." Game on.

An amazing game especially if you like the FPS genre and the story is also interesting.

Unfortunately, Half-Life’s puzzle-oriented play leads to some problems. On several occasions, you’ll be forced to make almost impossible jumps. The difficulty of such maneuvers finds you making 10, sometimes 15 attempts. The frustration distances you from a story that should have you absorbed.

Best Game ever!

Un shooter plataformero en primera persona. Gran juego, sin dudar un clásico. La historia es muy buena sin embargo hay que estar atentos a los diálogos de los NCP para captar ciertos detalles así como el "siguiente objetivo". No es sencillo perderse ya que es muy lineal aunque hay breves momentos donde debes plantearte por donde continuar o simplemente probar los caminos disponibles.
Gran variedad de escenarios, armas y enemigos. Las armas se van encontrando de a poco sin embargo si omites alguna (ya que a veces están en algún camino que no es el necesario para avanzar en el juego) llega un momento donde son un poco necesarias y te las entregan por si te salteaste una.
Poco que criticar pero más que nada ciertos bugs que contiene donde quedas bloqueado por alguna válvula que abres, ascensor o algun otro detalle. Por lo demás, gran juego.

[h1] Half-Life - один из лучших шутеров, созданных когда-либо [/h1]

Несколько раз бросал прохождение Black Mesa и оригинальной игры на начальных главах из-за того, что игра особо не увлекала (хотя сам лор и вселенная были интересны давно). Недавно решил от нечего делать поиграть в нее снова, практически ни на что не надеясь, а в итоге.. устроил себе 10-ти часовой марафон и прошел ее полностью. Жаль, что раньше умышленно игнорировал этот проект и как-то не доводил прохождение до конца - он того стоит. Несмотря на ужасную графику времен Палеозойской эры, ураганный геймплей творения Valve увлекает покруче большинства современных FPS от других разработчиков.

[b] Рекомендую к прохождению. [/b]
